QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_clr_horizon.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_horizon.id as clr_horizon_key, odf_ca_clr_horizon.id as clarity_clr_horizon_key, odf_ca_clr_horizon.code as id, odf_ca_clr_horizon.name as name, odf_ca_clr_horizon.created_date as clarity_created_date, odf_ca_clr_horizon.last_updated_date as clarity_updated_date, odf_ca_clr_horizon.odf_parent_id as inv_key, odf_ca_clr_horizon.vsm_allocation_pct as vsm_allocation_pct, odf_ca_clr_horizon.vsm_horizon as vsm_horizon_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'VSM_INV_HORIZON' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = odf_ca_clr_horizon.vsm_horizon) as vsm_horizon_caption, dataw_context.language_code, dataw_context.id language_id from odf_ca_clr_horizon odf_ca_clr_horizon inner join cmn_languages dataw_context on dataw_context.id = dataw_context.id where 1 = 1 and dataw_context.is_dw_enabled=1
